name: Die Arena
description:
Enter the arena, and teach the dice that wronged you a lesson. Dodge their incoming attacks and shoot back at them with your own!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left click to shoot

Music made by: patrickdearteaga.com

You can download a file in Windows, macOS, or Linux if you want a downloadable file. There are no guarantees that macOS and Linux will work for your computer.
